paper_abstract: The Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) standard supports the expression of security assertions such as authentication, role membership, or permissions. SAML assertions may be used to realize single-sign-on between Web servers located in different domains. After a short introduction to SAML, this article describes the application of SAML to protect, Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) signaling..
paper_title: Using SAML to protect the session initiation protocol (SIP)
